snippet: On Monday night, after an arguable call, Giants Coach Tom Coughlin delayed in throwing a challenge flag, the Colts quickly snapped the ball, and Coby Fleener ran untouched into the end zone.
abstract: Bill Pennington On Pro Football column examines New York Giants coach Tom Coughlin's failure to throw challenge flag in time during humiliating loss to the Indianapolis Colts; holds that while it was certainly a mistake, it should not obscure multiple lapses by the Giants that have led to downward spiral in season.
lead_paragraph: On Monday night, after an arguable call, Giants Coach Tom Coughlin delayed in throwing a challenge flag, the Colts quickly snapped the ball, and Coby Fleener ran untouched into the end zone.

headline.seo: Tom Coughlin Miscue Is Just One of the Skidding Giants' Problems
headline.main: Coach Botched Challenge, but Red Flags Are Easy to Find
headline.print_headline: Coach Botched Challenge. Now Red Flags Are Easy to Find.
